code: import{useState}from'react';import{placeBet,getClaimable,withdrawClaim}from'../utils/contract';import{toast}from'sonner';export const useContract=()=>{const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handlePlaceBet=async(marketId,outcome,amount)=>{setLoading(true);try{const tx=await placeBet(marketId,outcome,amount);toast.success('Bet placed successfully!');return tx;}catch(error){console.error('Place bet error:',error);toast.error(error.message||'Failed to place bet');throw error;}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleWithdraw=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const tx=await withdrawClaim();toast.success('Withdrawal successful!');return tx;}catch(error){console.error('Withdraw error:',error);toast.error(error.message||'Failed to withdraw');throw error;}finally{setLoading(false);}};const checkClaimable=async address=>{try{const amount=await getClaimable(address);return amount;}catch(error){console.error('Check claimable error:',error);return'0';}};return{loading,handlePlaceBet,handleWithdraw,checkClaimable};};
